verses.verse: Now you shall <S%H1413>gather<s%> yourself in <S%H1416>troops,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1416>troops.<s%> He has <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> against <S%H5221>us.<s%> They will strike the <S%H8199>judge<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> on the <S%H3895>cheek.<s%>

But <S%H1035>you,<s%> Bethlehem <S%H672>Ephrathah,<s%> being <S%H6810>small<s%> among the <S%H505>clans<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> out of you one will come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to me that is to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> whose goings <S%H4163>forth<s%> are from of <S%H6924>old,<s%> from <S%H3117>everlasting.<s%>

Therefore he will <S%H5414>abandon<s%> them until the <S%H6256>time<s%> that she who is in <S%H3205>labor<s%> gives <S%H3205>birth.<s%> Then the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He shall <S%H5975>stand,<s%> and shall <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> in the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God:<s%> and they will <S%H3427>live,<s%> for then he will be <S%H1431>great<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He will be our <S%H7965>peace<s%> when <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H935>invades<s%> our <S%H776>land,<s%> and when he <S%H1869>marches<s%> through our <S%H759>fortresses,<s%> then we will <S%H6965>raise<s%> against him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5257>leaders<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

They will <S%H7462>rule<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> in its <S%H6607>gates.<s%> He will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us from the <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> when he <S%H935>invades<s%> our <S%H776>land,<s%> and when he <S%H1869>marches<s%> within our <S%H1366>border.<s%>

The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> like <S%H2919>dew<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> like <S%H7241>showers<s%> on the <S%H6212>grass,<s%> that <S%H6960>don't<s%> wait for <S%H376>man,<s%> nor <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will be among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> like a <S%H738>lion<s%> among the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> like a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> among the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep;<s%> <S%H5674>who,<s%> if he goes through, treads <S%H7429>down<s%> and tears in <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> and there is no one to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>
Let your <S%H3027>hand<s%> be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above your <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and let all of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

"It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "That I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> your <S%H5483>horses<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6>you,<s%> and will destroy your <S%H4818>chariots.<s%>
I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6145>cities<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> and will tear <S%H2040>down<s%> all your <S%H4013>strongholds.<s%>
I will <S%H3772>destroy<s%> <S%H3785>witchcraft<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall have no <S%H6049>soothsayers.<s%>

I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> your engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> and your <S%H4676>pillars<s%> out of your <S%H7130>midst;<s%> and you shall no more <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
I will <S%H5428>uproot<s%> your <S%H842>Asherim<s%> out of your <S%H7130>midst;<s%> and I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> your <S%H6145>cities.<s%>
I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen."
